title: Netlink
description: Far from human-explored space, Dev now inhabits the computer-like neural network of a DalRiss/Naga exploratory fleet as a download personality. There, he encounters a new civilization of true Xenophobes--a race of asteroid-dwelling aliens intent on the genocide of all foreign species. To deal with this threat, the Conferation must put aside their differences and unite. Original.
author: William H. Keith Jr.
